parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sorts listbox entries alphabetically ascending by their [[lbText]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lbSort]] control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[lbSort]] [control, sortOrder] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.18</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value>  sortOrder: [[String]] - "ASC": ascending, "DESC": descending

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> [[lbSort]] idc <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.67</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value>  idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s4</name>=<value> [[lbSort]] [idc, sortOrder] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.67</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p61</name>=<value>  idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p62</name>=<value>  sortOrder: [[String]] - "ASC": ascending, "DESC": descending

</value></part><part><name>r4</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSort]] _myControl;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSort]] [_myControl, "DESC"];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSort]] 101;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSort]] [101, "DESC"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbSortByValue]], [[lnbSort]], [[tvSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[lnbSortByValue]], [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>
